title: Cowboy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose a player to duel.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you duel a player, for each following night until one of you dies, each of you chooses one:
> - Charge: You gain one charge.
> - Shield: You gain Basic defense for the night.
> - Gun: You deal a Basic attack to the other player. Costs 1 charge.
> - Reflect: You gain Powerful defense for the night and redirect all Basic attacks against you to the attacker tonight. Costs 1 charge.
> - Dynamite: You deal a Powerful attack to the other player unless they're attacking you. Costs 2 charges.
- You cannot die by any means other than duels.
- The first two times you would die in a duel, instead, end the duel and the other player may choose any of Shield, Gun, Reflect, or Dynamite to permanently have as an ability that they may multitask for the rest of the game and they gain 2 charges.
